item.title: Consumer Health Articles: ARE YOU SLEEPING IN A CANCER ZONE?
item.description:
Consumer Health Articles: ARE YOU SLEEPING IN A CANCER ZONE?

GEOPATHIC ZONES We sleep for about eight hours in the same spot, or sit at work for eight hours in the same spot, and if that is what is called a geopathically stressed zone, some problem will eventually arise because of that.

item.title: Earth Energy lines / Ley lines explained
item.description:
Earth Energy lines / Ley lines explained

This is an Interview with Rory Duff who explains about the Bristol Earth Energy line mapping projects. It also includes information on what the lines are, some of the interesting observations on the lines and how they move as well as showing a map of the UK major Leylines/ Earth Energy lines.
